title: Vampire shoppers
description: Shopping online in the middle of the night is becoming popular but, is it always a good idea?

vocabItems.definition: to get sucked into somethingnot being able to stop yourself getting involved with something that you don't want to do
to stop yourself acting on a strong feeling to do something
doing something that gives someone a happy and positive feeling
sad feeling you get when you've made a mistake and wished you hadn't made the mistake in the first place
